title: Looking for a solid team of 5 to play regularly (bronze/silver)
body: I have been playing LoL for around 2 or more years now and although I have been quite competitive in ranked at the start of this year I haven't really been able to play it on the level that I would like to. I want to start up a team of 5 that can play on a regular basis say once an evening or more (I would be open to even just a few games a weekend) but I would like it to be structured like a club where we meet up on skype at say 8 and play a game or 2 together. I am in Bronze 3 now with just over 500 normal wins. If you are interested ask some questions and comment :) Thanks.

replies.body:
Silver 3, Keen to play ranked 5's
IGN: Tealey

i have a team of 3 and were looking for 2 more an adc and top laner 
we havent been able to do much ranked as there is 3 us 
we play a few game in the week and have a drink on fridays and saturdays 
we always skype and use viber to have a chat room where we are all connected to lol talk where i post the latest rotations and patch notes and comes in handy if you have time for a game you can just send the msg and we all get it

Silver 3, Keen to play ranked 5's
IGN: Tealey
are you guys still looking for one more??
This sounds great! I main adc and used to main top lane :) it would be great to just play some games as a team, if you wanted I would be happy to join
